alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:13PM EDT until July 21 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Anne Arundel County in central Maryland... Northwestern St. Marys County in southern Maryland... Calvert County in southern Maryland... Southeastern Prince Georges County in central Maryland... Northeastern Charles County in southern Maryland... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 313 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hallowing Point, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Chesapeake Beach, Prince Frederick, Sheridan Point, Hallowing Point, Breezy Point, Golden Beach, Dunkirk, Saint Leonard, Huntingtown, Hughesville, Owings, Baden, Long Beach, Mechanicsville, Charlotte Hall, Aquasco, Calvert Beach, Bryantown, Friendship and Benedict. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anne Arundel; Calvert; Charles; Prince Georges; St. Marys
